name: Egg Mother - LDJAM46
description:
You are a mother cat-like creature and your job is to protect your Egg!

Everybody wants to eat your egg.
Squash the roaches before they get hungry and take a bite out of your egg.
Distract the beaky bird creautres so they chase you instead of the egg.
Your only weapon is your speed.

Use the mouse to move and press LMB to dash.

Good Luck!

PS if you really can't keep it alive and want to finish press "i" for invulnerability.
